version_description:
- Improved the forecast for the next 3 days to calculate in more accurate way the alerts updated from NOAA and NASA.
- Improved the automatic alert system in real time. We have implemented new intelligent functionality with checking of data in the background to keep you alerted and protected in a more efficient way, now the app protects you it when it considers it necessary in a way much more intelligent and autonomous, although the forecasts will continue to have remote monitoring to ensure its reliability. Push the remote alerts are now used as a secondary system for emergency alert.
- Significant improvements in the policy of alerts, for your complete comfort now you can choose with what types of solar events you will be alerted.
- Important updates to the code that improve the performance and stability have been implemented.

- Improved the forecast for the next 3 days to calculate in more accurate way the alerts updated from NOAA and NASA.
- Improved the automatic alert system in real time. We have implemented new intelligent functionality with checking of data in the background to keep you alerted and protected in a more efficient way, now the app protects you it when it considers it necessary in a way much more intelligent and autonomous, although the forecasts will continue to have remote monitoring to ensure its reliability. Push the remote alerts are now used as a secondary system for emergency alert.
- Significant improvements in the policy of alerts, for your complete comfort now you can choose with what types of solar events you will be alerted.
- Important updates to the code that improve the performance and stability have been implemented.

- Updated the algorithm that updates solar data from NASA and NOAA.
- To save battery has been disabled the geolocation when the app is in background, now the geolocation works only when the app is in use. The alerts in the background work supposing potential risks for the entire planet.
- Little bugs fixed.

- Updated the algorithm that updates solar data from NASA and NOAA.
- To save battery has been disabled the geolocation when the app is in background, now the geolocation works only when the app is in use. The alerts in the background work supposing potential risks for the entire planet.
- Little bugs fixed.

- Little bugs fixed.

- Improved trial period.

- Added technical interface with more images and movies of the daily sun activity.
- Little bugs fixed.

- Added technical interface with more images and movies of the daily sun activity.
- Little bugs fixed.
- Bugs fixes.
- Bugs fixes.

- Implemented the functionality to alert you to the possibility of events of auroras. Now Solar Alert, in addition to protecting you against the dangerous solar events also can alert you with hourly precision and in realtime when occur auroras in certain areas of the Earth. To activate this interesting feature that is disabled by default, you must go to the settings screen by clicking on the white button on the main screen and enable all alerts including auroras.

- Implemented the functionality to alert you to the possibility of events of auroras. Now Solar Alert, in addition to protecting you against the dangerous solar events also can alert you with hourly precision and in realtime when occur auroras in certain areas of the Earth. To activate this interesting feature that is disabled by default, you must go to the settings screen by clicking on the white button on the main screen and enable all alerts including auroras.

- Updated privacy policy & terms of use.
- Bug fixes.

- Updated privacy policy & terms of use.
- Bug fixes.

- Significant improvement in the algorithm that checks the forecasts of solar activity. Now Solar Alert acts intelligently so that the internet connection using the data from the remote solar sources always be appropriate to keep alerted and protected.

- Improved the loading function of updated images of auroras from remote sources providing the information to the user of the charging process.

- Improved significantly the performance of Solar Alert implementing improvements globally in all code, which has been optimized and upgraded to meet the requirements of the latest Apple devices with the latest version of IOS.

- Fix several bugs to ensure optimum performance.

The Genial Apps team would like to thank all users subscribed for their collaboration and confidence in our work, thanks to you is possible Solar Alert, the only service of alert and protection against the extreme solar event that scientists worldwide have already assured that it will reach to our planet and to our technified society possibly coming soon.

- Added scientific report that demonstrates how intense solar activity causes alterations in the circadian rhythm, the biological mechanism that regulates the physiological functions of the organism of humans and all living beings. Report extracted from US National Library of Medicine.
